proposal.name: EXT_texture_norm16_dom_source

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebGL working group

features.feature: In addition to support for ArrayBufferView in EXT_texture_norm16, the texImage2D and texSubImage2D entry points taking ImageBitmap and HTMLImageElement are extended to accept the pixel type UNSIGNED_SHORT, with associated internal format being one of R16_EXT, RG16_EXT, RGB16_EXT, and RGBA16_EXT.
The supported HTMLImageElement file format is PNG only.
